price: Isatti hin amananu, Dhugumatti, gochi (adabbiin) warra duraanii dabartee jirti (wanti isaan tuqe isaan kanas ni tuqa).
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ وَقَدۡ خَلَتۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi waqad khalat sunnatu al-awalīna
